DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample blood patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn change occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This research trial study biomarkers sample patient rhabdomyosarcoma .
DOC.brief_title: Studying Biomarkers Samples From Patients With Rhabdomyosarcoma
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine whether circulate muscle-specific microRNAs , especially serum miR-206 , potential biomarkers rhabdomyosarcoma ( RMS ) . OUTLINE : Archived serum sample analyze miR-206 expression . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 15 sample patient alveolar rhabdomyosarcoma ( RMS ) , 15 patient embryonal RMS , 10 patient without RMS accrue study .
